official_title: A bill to amend section 118(a) of title 28, United States Code, to require that district court shall be held at Pottsville, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania shall be held in Pottsville, Pennsylvania, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 118(a) of title 28, United States Code, to require that district court shall be held at Pottsville, Pennsylvania.
